Massey University: Massey University (Māori: Te Kunenga ki Pūrehuroa) is a university based in New Zealand, with significant campuses in Auckland, Palmerston North,  and Wellington. Massey University has approximately 27,533 students, 18,358 of whom study either partly or fully by distance.[4] Research is undertaken on all three campuses and people from over 130 countries study at the university.[5][6] Data from the 2017 annual report shows that 42% of the domestic students are based in Auckland, 38% in Palmerston North and 20% in Wellington.[7]
